statement.name: findRandomTracks
statement.sql: SELECT {trackColumns}, COUNT(i.hash) AS imagecount FROM track t LEFT OUTER JOIN image i ON i.hash = t.image_hash WHERE (:sourcePlaylistId IS NULL OR EXISTS (SELECT * FROM link_track_playlist ltp WHERE ltp.track_id = t.id AND ltp.playlist_id = :sourcePlaylistId)) AND (t.video = :video OR NOT t.video = :audio) AND (NOT t.protected OR t.protected = :protected) GROUP BY {groupByTrackColumns} ORDER BY RAND() LIMIT :maxCount

statement.name: findLastUpdatedTracks
statement.sql: SELECT {trackColumns}, COUNT(i.hash) AS imagecount FROM track t LEFT OUTER JOIN image i ON i.hash = t.image_hash WHERE (:sourcePlaylistId IS NULL OR EXISTS (SELECT * FROM link_track_playlist ltp WHERE ltp.track_id = t.id AND ltp.playlist_id = :sourcePlaylistId)) GROUP BY {groupByTrackColumns} ORDER BY ts_updated DESC LIMIT :maxCount

statement.name: findMostPlayedTracks
statement.sql: SELECT {trackColumns}, COUNT(i.hash) AS imagecount FROM track t LEFT OUTER JOIN image i ON i.hash = t.image_hash WHERE (:sourcePlaylistId IS NULL OR EXISTS (SELECT * FROM link_track_playlist ltp WHERE ltp.track_id = t.id AND ltp.playlist_id = :sourcePlaylistId)) GROUP BY {groupByTrackColumns} ORDER BY playcount DESC LIMIT :maxCount

statement.name: findRandomTracksRestricted
statement.sql: SELECT {trackColumns}, COUNT(i.hash) AS imagecount FROM link_track_playlist rltp, track t LEFT OUTER JOIN image i ON i.hash = t.image_hash WHERE (:sourcePlaylistId IS NULL OR EXISTS (SELECT * FROM link_track_playlist ltp WHERE ltp.track_id = t.id AND ltp.playlist_id = :sourcePlaylistId)) AND rltp.playlist_id = :restrictedPlaylistId AND t.id = rltp.track_id AND (t.video = :video OR NOT t.video = :audio) AND (NOT t.protected OR t.protected = :protected) GROUP BY {groupByTrackColumns} ORDER BY RAND() LIMIT :maxCount

statement.name: findAlbumImage
statement.sql: SELECT data AS data FROM image i, track t WHERE t.album = :album AND i.hash = t.image_hash AND i.size = :size LIMIT 1

statement.name: nextPlaylistId
statement.sql: SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS id FROM playlist_id_sequence LIMIT 1
